sen.e: Descendants of Prince Ogura and Prince Ishiura who were sons of Mihara no Okimi, flourished as the Kiyohara Clan, famous poets such as KIYOHARA no Fukayabu, KIYOHARA no Motosuke and Sei Shonagon were from the Kiyohara family.
